Articles.Content: 0.20 Was just realeased the 22nd,but I don't know how to update. Help.

If you are on steam you should click on the game and click update.

From the forum click on Kerbal Space Program option on the menu. This should take you through to the website.

Click on store in the bar near the top.

On the right near the top you should see a place to log in.

Log in with the details you used to buy the game and then once its logged in click profile where the login area was.

Scroll down the the bottom of the page and click download.

Then click on your operating system and it will download. This will be version 0.20
I don't have my old profile that I used to buy the game though.
If you remember your email I'm sure you could contact support to recover/change your password for your store profile.
